item.title: These Handmade Friendship Bracelets Are Taking Over Istanbul 2025!
item.description: In a world that often feels vast and disconnected, NDesignstudio brings people closer togetherâ€”one bracelet at a time. Founded by the creative visionary Nemah Alsayed, NDesignstudio specializes in handcrafted friendship bracelets that are more than just accessories; they are wearable stories, symbols of unity, and celebrations of global diversity. Each bracelet is meticulously crafted with beads and threads, carefully chosen to represent the unique colors and cultural DNA of countries around the world.
